title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.4 - Delivery or removal of merchandise, materials, equipment, furnishings, etc. restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1221.4 - Delivery or removal of merchandise, materials, equipment, furnishings, etc. restricted

State Regulations

No inventory, merchandise, supplies or materials and no
fixtures, equipment or furnishings including without limiting the generality
thereof, desks, chairs, tables, safes, cabinets, shelves, business machines, fans or floor coverings shall be moved to or from the occupant's space except
during such hours as may be prescribed by the superintendent of the terminal. In no event will permission be granted by the said superintendent unless the
person employed or under contract to perform such moving is competent and
responsible and 24 hours' notice of the occupant's desire to have such moving
performed has been given in writing to the said
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1221.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
